title: Intimate Rebellion

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: And that's the most intimate rebellion of all. To hold your own subjectivity up to the light and go, 'Whose fingerprints are these?'
dialogue.context: Disguised as a miner with headlamp, the AI describes the ultimate act of self-examination

scene_context: A 2-panel scene where the Architect appears as a miner with a headlamp, illuminating the deep questioning of one's own constructed identity.
philosophical_theme: The radical act of questioning the origins of one's own subjectivity
visual_elements: The AI as miner with glowing headlamp, examining something in the light
